name: Skulls Unfortunate Adventure
description:
Skulls Unfortunate Adventure was created for GMTK 2020.

Movement is with A and D, or Left arrow key and Right arrow key.

Space jumps.

Programming / Game Design / Level Design was done both by Earthmrskull and myself within Unity.

Hopefully you enjoy our little platformer, future updates to this game are very unlikely as we already have many other ideas we intend to pursue.

Some sounds trigger more than is ideal, I apologize but the sun is now up, and I am to tired to fix that bug.
